website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line stand-alone grill worthy of your top-of-the-line cuts of meat.
pros: Does not require you to babysit the meat
You can set your temps and leave it to cook
Also comes in four-burner and six-burner options

customer_reviews.title: Take your time !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Weber grill. 16 years on the first! After a problem free delivery, I began the assembly process. As with most assembly experiences, DO NOT RUSH !!!. From unpacking to completion took about 3 hours. The most difficult task was peeling off the protective film from the stainless steel surfaces. Although Weber included a couple of assembly tools, I discarded them and used my own socket set and screwdrivers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used the grill four times to date and am quite impressed. I am by no means a pro at grilling, but by following recipes from a separately purchased Weber cookbook I have had no fails. The ease of igniting the burners and the grease collection system are big winners. I find the heat is even but adjustable for indirect cooking. The grill is sturdy and attractive. I am glad I purchased this grill and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Popalis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, nice grill
customer_reviews.text: I removed one star for installation because the threads were poorly tapped on one of the base pieces, and I ended up shearing off a bolt head. I assembled it solo in about an hour. (Including beverage breaks) Other than that, I'm very happy with this grill. I'm just about through my first tank, and have used it probably 15 times this season. With two burners on high, it reaches 450 pretty quickly. I've only had all three burners going once and it was into the 700 range before I turned down the heat. The grates after holding up nicely, and clean up well with minimal effort. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Baker

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT directed against Amazon, or the supplier BUT WEBER. A plastic cover missing - igniter does NOT work, Haed to order. You would think that Weber would overnight the parts RIGHT? Not even close - still waiting.... Weber supposed to be the best, be careful that you don't fall of your throne.
customer_reviews.author: Bernd J. Klawunder

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the drip pans because you might grilling every day now.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is awesome! It was easy to put together and I love the quick disconnect to line, the hose is long to give you movement and it’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Holly K.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous grill!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble using the step-by-step phone app. High quality parts. The perfect backyard grill!
customer_reviews.author: Babe and Bino

customer_reviews.title: Tiny wheels are useless.  Larger wheels are helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of grill space for veggie grilling. We're happy with it but we only used it twice before the end of the outdoor grilling season. I don't know why they use wheels that are only suitable for perfectly flat surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: P. Graham

customer_reviews.title: What a great grill!
customer_reviews.text: Just had this delivered this morning. My son and I took just over 2 hours to assemble it. The instructions were mostly easy to follow - just keep in mind the pictures are not necessarily exactly the grill you got. After a burn-in we were ready to cook my father-in-law's birthday dinner. The heat distribution was great and temperature control was easy. The steaks turned out delicious and it was much easier to keep them consistent than my previous grill.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Read fine print when  ordering ,
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this grill I believe I had ordered a natural gas grill when I received it it was a propane went back and looked at my order didn’t realize when I searched it I searched natural gas but it came up propane so that was my fault but they don’t offer a conversion kit they say it’s dangerous and you can’t do it , you have to buy another grill for $800 I’m not buying another grill we did find a conversion kit online but it Nullified our 10 year warranty was my fault I had to read the fine print even though I searched natural gas grill
customer_reviews.author: bear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill
customer_reviews.text: Love my new weber, hope it last as long as the warranty, I've had my weber for several months now, works great, very happy with my buy
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Britz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Cooks Food Better
customer_reviews.text: It takes some work to assemble but instructions are well written. Nice quality unit. I’ve had the fancier Stainless steel version for 9 years. Weber grills do a great job of cooking anything. Expensive but they last a long time and they do a better job of cooking meats/vegetables just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was long, but very easy!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use the grille after having assembled it over the past two days. Weber deserves a shout out for ease of assembly and crystal clear instructions. Everything lined up perfectly, parts are high quality, and the instructions easy to follow. I’ll add to the review in a few weeks, but was so pleasantly surprised by the assembly process that it warranted a comment now.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I love my grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. It works great. With the help of the iGrill probe, the meat is done perfectly every time. Assembly was easy for me because Amazon paid someone to put the grill together. I would not have attempted this chore by myself.
customer_reviews.author: jolyon

customer_reviews.title: What else needs to be said, it's a Weber
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank and has the warranty to back it up. 10 years! Compared to our now retired 25 yo Weber, this one almost cooks hotter on low that the old one on full blast. Burgers done in 60 seconds anyone?! It's great.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Complex but good grill
customer_reviews.text: It took my Auto Mechanic son several hours to assemble this grill. So it's not for an Average Joe to put together. But once assembled, works well. Good size. Cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Bank

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit of a pain to assemble, even with two people, but it's a terrific grill.
customer_reviews.author: SunByrne

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: took 3 hours to assemble and the directions were not in words inky drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, does an excellent job of BBQ'g the food with even heat.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Great grill that comes with many, many parts.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful grill, but husband did not like putting it together!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Candelario

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the grill a few times. It cooks evenly and has great heat. Low rating for easy to assemble is due to a packaging/shipping issue. Grill arrived with sticky gunk and a big dent on the lid. Could have shipped back I guess but that seemed like a big pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It distributes heat wonderfully so everything comes out cooked perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Weekend Barbecue just got better!! Great purchase and very useful!! Love how the food tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Love my grill!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is wonderful! It did take longer than expected to assemble but it was easy to do and I love the result.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenladi

customer_reviews.title: Works just like my old one, but better!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like my old one! I had a Silver B for over 20 years, this one is even better!
customer_reviews.author: jeff.wilson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, easy to assemble, igniters work flawlessly, cooks like a charm - even better than advertised!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Best grill yet !!
customer_reviews.text: likes, heating time, cook time, cleaning all rate five stars !!
customer_reviews.author: gunnut

customer_reviews.title: Great, proven design
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my Dad. He loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent BBQ!
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over our old BBQ. Meat is perfectly cooked!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Godwin

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great grill!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily we were able to hire someone to assemble it for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even heat to all areas
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but bottom rails were bent so I had to bend them back. Heats all areas evenly but goes to 500 degrees no matter if set to high or medium but works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: new Weber grill
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Weber grill, I had call Weber's Customer service due to parts missing in the package! Not very responsive! In pass my dealing with Weber were fine, however this time they were pretty bad. I regrett buying a Weber grill if I get another it will not be a Weber! Plenty equal or better grills for less $ with better service!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Weber is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: My last Weber lasted 10 years and I wouldn't have purchased a new one if my wife wasn't constantly b--ching. 10 year warranty on all items. You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wacco for Flacco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it works great. A bargain for its value
customer_reviews.author: michael harris

customer_reviews.title: Get the 315 with cabinet doors
customer_reviews.text: The open cabinet with the open drip pan is a hazard. Unless you have no pets and intend to take out the drip pan constantly, buy the 315. Weber customer service is horrible: they've had huge turnover in the last year, just before they put out the Gensis 2 model and it shows. We've bought Weber for years--no more.
customer_reviews.author: coastal

customer_reviews.title: Weight of Grill Top
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Weber Genesis 310 propane grill 4 years ago. It's an excellent grill. My only caution is the weight and size of the top that covers the grill. I am an average-size woman in perfectly good health but find opening and closing the grill top when in use with the burners on somewhat difficult and potentially dangerous. I wish I had purchased a smaller grill. I think this is an issue to consider depending on who will be doing most of the grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Cymbi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is perfect if you want to “eat out” without leaving your house. The grill heats evenly allowing you to choose any heating level in order to grill anything from a steak to hot dogs to veggies. It is easy to clean and makes an attractive addition to a patio.
customer_reviews.author: Kand

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill I ever had. Impressive build, quality looks great and works perfectly every time. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Guy from Oklahoma

product_meta.title: Weber 66001001 Genesis II S-310 Natural Gas 3-Burner Grill, Stainless Steel
feature_bullets: Equipped with the GS4 high performance grilling system featuring infinity ignition, high-performance burners, stainless steel flavorizer bars and grease management system; BTU-per-hour input: 39,000
Solid 7mm Stainless Steel rod cooking grates provide superior heat retention
Ample Cooking Surface. Up to 669 sq in, including the tuck-away warming rack.
iGrill 3 compatible, for perfectly grilled food (accessory sold separately)
10 Year Warranty, 100% Weber guarantee; Main burners: BTU-per-hour input: 39,000
3D interactive assembly instructions for this product are available through the free BILT app.

This product is a Natural Gas unit and you must have Natural Gas plumbed out to your patio or deck to be able to use this grill; If you do not have Natural Gas plumbed, please look at our selection of Propane barbecues
